data.name: Lordaeron
data.description:
Lordaeron

Units:
+10% attack rate

Buildings:
+1 armor

Upgrades:
+3Lv Unit Armor

Magic:
Holy Light (100 HP to 1 unit)
Blizzard (90 damage in 225 AoE)
Resurrection (revives 1 unit)

Traits: Jacks of all trades but masters of none. Very basic and simple, but versatile and adaptive. Good in every situation, foolproof and idiotfriendly. Easy to play and very boring. Recomended for total Noobs.

Difficulty: Beginer

bonuses.name: Sorceress Supreme [Q]
bonuses.description:
Jaina replaces Antonidas

Hero Unit (Ranged)
-10% buy cost
-10% buy cooldown
Gets special items at Lv4/8/14/20
Role: Hybrid (Nuker/Support)
Can learn:
Blizzard (Damage Spell)
225-375 damage in an area
(200-350 area of effect)
Lesser Ice Prison (Disable Spell)
10-20 sec stun
(350-650 area of effect)
Arcane Shield (Self Spell)
6-12 sec near invulnarability
Water Elemental (Summoning Spell)
summons 2 units for 30-60 sec

Type: Hero Power

bonuses.name: Dalaran Crystal Armor [W]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Critical Strike
+1 level of Banner of Lordaeron

Reduces spell damage to Footman, Archer, Mage, Pikeman and Knight by 20%. Increases their hit points by 25.

Type: Anti Magic Damage

bonuses.name: Stromgarde Halberdier [E]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Defend

Stromgarde Halberdier replaces Footman
Melee Unit
-20% attack rate
+8 damage
+25 HP
Abilities:
Long Weapon (Passive Skill)
(30% to do 2x damage)
(affects strong creeps only)
Hold the Line (Support Mini Aura)
(+3 armor to other units in 100 AoE)
(does not affect Special unit)
Upgrades used:
Steel Swords
Steel Armor
Critical Strike
Defend

Type: Anti Heavy Creeps

bonuses.name: Arcane Artifacts [X]
bonuses.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 4 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.name: Arcane Artifacts
spells.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 4 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

(affects organic units only)

bonuses.name: We hate Heroes! [V]
bonuses.description:
No, seriously, we do hate them!

Type: Anti Hero
This is not a Hero game. Sometimes you need to stomp your foot down and show those scum their place.

spells.description:

Deals 25000 damage.

spells.description:

(2000 range)

spells.name: We hate Heroes!

towerUpgrades.name: Critical Strike
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance for bonus damage
Affects: Footman and Knight

Lv1: 10% to do 2x damage
Lv2: 20% to do 2x damage
Lv3: 30% to do 2x damage
Lv4: 40% to do 2x damage

Gives: chance to block/reflect an attack
Affects: Footman and Pikeman
(only Piercing can be reflected)

Lv1: 15% chance, -15% move speed
Lv2: 30% chance, -20% move speed
Lv3: 45% chance, -25% move speed
Lv4: 60% chance, -30% move speed

towerUpgrades.name: Arcane Explosion
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage in 175 AoE
Affects: Kirin Tor Apprentice
(has 2 sec casting time)

Lv1: 60 damage, 1 explosion
Lv2: 60 damage, 2 explosions
Lv3: 60 damage, 3 explosions
Lv4: 60 damage, 4 explosions

spells.name: Visual Gryphon Hammer
spells.description: Adds visual effect.

towerUpgrades.name: Improved Ballistics
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: attack rate and damage
Affects: Archer and Catapult

Lv1: +5% attack rate, +4/+12 damage
Lv2: +10% attack rate, +8/+24 damage
Lv3: +15% attack rate, +12/+36 damage
Lv4: +20% attack rate, +16/+48 damage

towerUpgrades.name: Devotion Aura
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: armor to nearby units
Affects: Knight and Pikeman

Lv1: +3 armor in 300 AoE
Lv2: +5 armor in 350 AoE
Lv3: +7 armor in 400 AoE
Lv4: +9 armor in 450 AoE

Gives: hit points and attack rate
Affects: Knight and Kirin Tor Apprentice

Lv1: +25 HP, +5% attack rate
Lv2: +50 HP, +10% attack rate
Lv3: +75 HP, +15% attack rate
Lv4: +100 HP, +20% attack rate

towerUpgrades.name: Searing Arrows
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: reduces target's armor
Affects: Archer and Arrow Tower
(does not affect Special unit)
(has half duration on Heroes)

Lv1: -3 armor for 12 sec
Lv2: -6 armor for 12 sec
Lv3: -9 armor for 12 sec
Lv4: -12 armor for 12 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Arcane Shield
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: near invulnerability
Affects: Mage and Kirin Tor Apprentice
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: lasts 3 sec
Lv2: lasts 4 sec
Lv3: lasts 5 sec
Lv4: lasts 6 sec

spells.name: Mana Shield [C]
spells.description: Blocks 1 damage per point of mana.

spells.name: Mana Shield [C]
spells.description: Blocks 1 damage per point of mana.

towerUpgrades.name: Banner of Lordaeron
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: extra unit in every 2nd wave
Affects: All Barracks
(can capture neutral buildings)

Lv1: has Long Weapon (3x damage)
25%/30%/35%/40% chance on attack
(affects strong creeps only)
Lv2: has Battle Cry (bonus damage)
+15%/+20%/+25% damage in 400 AoE
Lv3: has Lordaeron Banner (on death)
+15%/+20% attack rate in 500 AoE
Lv4: has Hold the Line (bonus armor)
+6 armor to other units in 100 AoE

spells.name: Rallying Cry
spells.description: Gives friendly nearby units a 0 bonus armor for 30 seconds.

heroes.name: First Paladin
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Support

Can learn:

175-325 damage, 15-30% slow
(250-400 area of effect)

300-600 HP to 5 units

8-14 sec near invulnerability

Resurrection (Summoning Spell)
revives 3-6 dead units

heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)

Weak Vs Buildings

35% to block 30-60 damage
